text: وترى المجرمين يومئذ مقرنين فى الاصفاد

translations.translation: that Day you will see the evildoers yoked together in chains,
You will see the wicked on that day bound together in chains.
On that Day you shall see the guilty ones secured in chains;
you will see the guilty ones bound in chains,
And on that day you will see the guilty linked together in chains.
And you will see the criminals that Day, Muqarranun (bound together) in fetters.
And you will see the guilty on that day linked together in chains.
And thou shalt see the sinners that day coupled in fetters,
Thou wilt see the guilty on that day linked together in chains,
On that Day you shall see the guilty bound in chains,
And thou wilt see the guilty on that Day bound together in fetters.
—on that day you will see the guilty bound together in chains,
And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-

And you will see the Mujrimun (criminals, disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism, polytheists, disobedient to Allah, etc.) that Day bound together in fetters; [Muqarranun in fetters; mean:- with their hands and feet tied to their necks with chains.]
On that Day, you shall see the sinners coupled together in fetters;
On that Day, you will see the sinners bound together in chains.
And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
[14:49] And you shall see, O Muhammad (s), the sinners, the disbelievers, on that day coupled, chained together with their [individual] devils, in chains, manacles or collars,

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: والتقرين : وضع اثنين في قرن ، أي حبل .والأصفاد جمع صِفاد بوزن كتاب ، وهو القيد والغل .

translations.translation: (Thou wilt see the guilty) the idolaters (on that day) the Day of Judgement (linked together in chains) with the satans.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلأَصْفَادِ } معناه السَّلاسِلُ والأَغْلاَلَ

translations.translation: And His saying, {Muttaqarriina fi as-Safaadi}, means the chains and shackles.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَتَرَى } حينئذٍ { ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ يَوْمَئِذٍ } الذين أجرموا بالله بإثبات الوجود لغيره وإسناد الحوادث إلى أسبابها العادية { مُّقَرَّنِينَ } مقيدين { فِي ٱلأَصْفَادِ } [إبراهيم: 49] أي: سلاسل التقليدات والتقييدات وأغلال التعينات والتخمينات
